addItem(StockItem) - Method in class BookStore

B

BookStore - Class in <Unnamed>
Manages the product information for a bookstore.
BookStore() - Constructor for class BookStore
Construct a new BookStore with no products.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class BookStore
 

P

productsByPerson(String) - Method in class BookStore
Create a new ArrayList and adds all stock items that have associated with the person to it.

S

sortedByQuantity() - Method in class BookStore
Create a new ArrayList and fill it with references to each stock item, and then sort the list (selection sort) in descending order by quantity
sortedByTitle() - Method in class BookStore
Create a new array and fill it with references to each stock item, and then sort the array (insertion sort) in alphabetical order by title, ignoring case

T

totalItemsInStock() - Method in class BookStore
Returns the total number of items in stock.
